title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

altTitles.ar: مهمة التنين: مغامة داي الكبرى: البطل افان و جحيم ملك الشياطين المستعر

altTitles.vi: Dragon Quest: Dũng giả Avan và Ngục viêm Ma vương

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: ×××ホリック

description.en: Watanuki Kimihiro is haunted by visions of ghosts and spirits. Seemingly by chance, he encounters a mysterious witch named Yuuko, who claims she can help. In desperation, he accepts, but realizes that he's just been tricked into working for Yuuko in order to pay off the cost of her services. Soon he's employed in her little shop- a job which turns out to be nothing like his previous work experience!
description.ja: アヤカシを視たり、惹き寄せたりする体質に悩む高校生の四月一日君尋（ワタヌキ　キミヒロ）。ある日、引き寄せられるように"ミセ"と呼ばれる館にたどり着き、女店主・壱原侑子（イチハラ　ユウコ）と出逢う。そこは見合った対価さえ支払えば、どんな願いでもかなえてくれる不思議な"ミセ"。四月一日は「アヤカシを視えなくしてもらう」という願いをかなえてもらうかわりに、対価として住み込みで働き、"ミセ"を訪れる客とともに、様々な怪奇現象に巻き込まれていくのだった。
description.pt-br: Kimihiro Watanuki é um estudante do secundário persuido por youkai e ayakashi, espíritos com uma forte atracção por ele. Os espíritos são invisíveis aos olhos dos outros e os encontros com eles são sempre problemáticos. Quando ele se depara com uma loja que concede desejos, os eventos da sua vida prometem deixar de ser normais. A loja é dirigida por Yuko Ichihara, uma mestiriosa e linda bruxa de vários nomes e de renome esotérico. Por um preço, ela oferecesse para conceder o desejo de os espíritos desapareceram a Kimihiro. O preço, de acordo com ela, deve ser igual em valor e assim, como pagamento, ele torna-se temporariamente o criado de Yuko. O trabalho dele consiste em pequenos recados em lidar com o sobrenatural e as tarefas de casa. O seu amor, Himawari Kunogi, e "rival", Shizuka Domeki, ocasionalmente juntam-se a ele no seu trabalho a pedido de Yuko. Os três tornam-se incrivelmente próximos apesar da contrariadade de Kimihiro e Domeki. Yuko refere-se constantemente ao hitsuzen, querendo dizer o inevitável, destino, ou sina, como sendo a força que guia o mundo. Ela afirma constantemente que as coincidências não existem, e que cada acção ou decisão é inevitável, porque sem eles, outros acontecimentos no futuro poderiam não acontecer.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

title.en: Creepy Internet Urban Legends: Horror Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: 洒落にならないネット掲示板百物語～都市伝説コミック怪談集～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinrei ni naranai Netto Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari: Toshi Densetsu Komikku Kaidan-shū

altTitles.en: Chilling Internet Forum 100 Stories: Urban Legend Comic Ghost Story Collection

description.en: This anthology features urban legends that gained fame on the internet, faithfully adapted into manga by talented artists!

altTitles.ja: 彼岸島 最後の47日間

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด - 47วันสุดท้ายสู่หายนะ

description.en:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!
description.fr:
Akira et la résistance humaine sont parvenus à conquérir le temple fortifié où résidait Miyabi. Alors que les derniers survivants profitent d'un repos de quelques jours bien mérité, un groupe d'étudiants échoue sur l'île d'Higanjima après avoir été attaqué par les démons marins. Ryosuke, Kasumi et Yamaoka vont très rapidement découvrir la cruauté sans limite des vampires.  
  
Miyabi, de son côté, ne compte pas en rester là et se prépare à attaquer le Japon directement grâce au nouveau moyen qu'il a trouvé pour vamprisier un maximum d'humain en un temps record. Son plan nécessite cependant 47 jours avant de pouvoir être mis en oeuvre.

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

altTitles.en: The Secret of the Chaotic Heavenly Emperor

altTitles.ja: 天才武者の再覚醒

description.en: Chu Jianqiu, by chance, obtains the Chaos Heavenly Emperor Technique and rises from weakness to embark on a journey across the myriad worlds. With a single thought, he can shatter star seas and rend the heavens. With a single thought, he can slay demons and ghosts, and bury gods and devils! He overlooks the myriad gods and heavens.

title.en: Orc no Shuhai ni Shukufuku wo

altTitles.ja: オークの酒杯に祝福を

altTitles.en: The Half-Blood Orc in the Blended World

description.en: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit, the daughter of a corrupt nobleman, go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY, left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!
description.ja: そこは《酒》が魔法の魔力源となる世界。ハーフオークのエルピスは師である転移者タナカの遺した《ウィスキー》を求め、悪徳貴族の令嬢マルギットが世界を旅する！

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.ja: 私の推しは悪役令嬢。

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

title.en: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

altTitles.ja-ro: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

title.en: A Single Aristocrat Enjoys a Different World: The Graceful Life of a Man Who Never Gets Married

altTitles.ja-ro: Dokushin Kizoku wa Isekai wo Ouka Suru ~Kekkon Shinai Otoko no Yuuga na Ohitori-sama Life~

altTitles.ja: 独身貴族は異世界を謳歌する ～結婚しない男の優雅なおひとりさまライフ～

altTitles.id: Bangsawan Lajang Yang Menikmati Hidup di Dunia Lain

description.en:
Toshinori Dokuraba, 35 years old. A so-called single aristocrat in Japan who enjoyed a single life without wife and children, even though he was tall, handsome, highly educated and had a high income. One day, he died alone at home.

However, he was liked by Hitorigami, the God of another world, and was able to reincarnate in that world. Reborn as Zirc Louren with skills and blessings from the God, he lived a new rosy life in a different world - then he turned 28 years old and enjoyed the single life again...

This is a story about the life of a single aristocrat who never gets married even if he reincarnates in another world.

title.en: Shiotaiou no Sato-san ga Ore ni dake Amai

altTitles.ja: 塩対応の佐藤さんが俺にだけ甘い

altTitles.en: Aren’t You Too Sweet Salt-God Sato-San?
The Salt-God Sato-san is only sweet to me!

altTitles.zh: 冷淡的佐藤同學只對我撒嬌

altTitles.th: คุณซาโต้ยอดนักเมิน เธอหวานใส่ผมแค่คนเดียว

description.en:
Satou-san is the unattainable flower of the class. She is always cold and curt with classmates, but only I know she's actually very cute when she smiles, even if she's not much of a photographer.  
Oshio-kun is friendly and lively, but only I know he works at his family's cafe after school. He does a great job with the cafe's SNS account, and his mischievous smile makes my heart skip a beat!  
Innocent and sweet, but sometimes frustrating, this is a 120%-pure fluffy story about two people falling in love for the first time.
description.ja:
こんなに甘い”両片想い”見たことない！

「佐藤さんは高嶺の花で誰に対しても塩対応。でも、意外と隙だらけだって俺だけが知ってる。写真を撮るのが下手。そのくせドヤ顔しがち。そして、へにゃっと笑う顔がすごく可愛い」

「押尾君は誰に対しても優しい。でも、意外といじわるなところもあるって私だけが知ってる。SNSを使うのが上手。オシャレなカフェの店員さん。そして、悪戯っぽく笑う顔にすごくドキドキする」

――これは内緒だけど、俺（私）はそんな彼女（彼）のことが好きだ。

初々しくて、もどかしい二人の初恋。尊さ＆糖度120％！
description.pt-br:
Satou-san é a flor inatingível da classe.  Ela é sempre fria e ríspida com os colegas de classe, mas só eu sei que ela é realmente muito fofa quando sorri, mesmo que ela não seja muito fotogênica.
  
Oshio-kun é amigável e animado, mas só eu sei que ele trabalha no café de sua família depois da escola.  Ele faz um ótimo trabalho com a conta da internet do café, e seu sorriso malicioso faz meu coração bater mais forte!
  
 Inocente e doce, mas às vezes frustrante, esta é uma história fofa 120% pura sobre duas pessoas se apaixonando pela primeira vez.

altTitles.ja: 救世主(メシア) ~人類を救いし者~

description.en: The story of Jesus Christ told through Manga.

Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

title.en: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

description.en: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

altTitles.ja: しゅごキャラ！ ジュエルジョーカー

description.en:
The long-awaited comeback! A new story of Amu and her guardian characters begins...!

The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

description.en:
Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side...

On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!

An idol with secrets × A caring manager 

Their story begins in the smoking area...
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

altTitles.ja: かわいい彼女ちゃん

description.en: A cute girl came knocking at the protagonist's door, but for what reason may it be.
description.ru: Милая девушка постучалась в дверь главного героя, но по какой причине это вообще произошло?
description.vi: Một cô gái dễ thương gõ cửa nhà tôi, còn để làm gì thì tôi không biết.
description.pt-br: Uma linda garota veio bater à porta do protagonista, mas por que razão?

altTitles.ja: 上杉くんは女の子をやめたい

altTitles.en: Uesugi-kun Wants to Quit Being a Girl

description.en: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...
description.ja:
可愛すぎる女体化男子の恋の行方は――！？

上杉ケースケの悩みは男子なのに小さくて可愛いこと。ある日、片想いの相手・のえるが「上杉が女の子だったらめっちゃ可愛くない!？」と話しているのを聞いてしまう。

「オレ、男扱いもされてないってこと…!？」

幼なじみで何でもできる瑛人には、身長も勉強も勝てないし、失恋もしちゃうし…。落ち込むケースケが、家の隣の神社で恋がかなうようにお願いをしてみると、身体が女の子になっちゃって――!?

altTitles.ja: ファイト一発!充電ちゃん!!

description.en: Plug works in a company from a parallel world and her job is to secretly revitalize people from our world who are stressed out. Her clumsiness always gets her into trouble and she is constantly in danger of having her salary cut due to her performance. One day, she meets a young teenager that makes her realize that revitalizing people mindlessly is just a temporary remedy and does not solve the root cause of the problem. She then slowly begins to see the importance of timing the revitalization. However, her new aim is the exact opposite of the company policy and her boss sends Aresta to supervise her. Will she be able to keep from losing her job?

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

altTitles.en: Os Cavaleiros do Zodiaco - The Lost Canvas - A Saga de Hades
Saint Seiya - The Lost Canvas - Meiou Shinwa
Saint Seiya - The Lost Canvas - The Myth of Hades
聖闘士星矢 THE LOST CANVAS 冥王神話

description.en:
This manga tells the story of the previous Holy War, taking place in the 18th century, 250 years before the original series, in the Saint Seiya universe. The story centers on the relation between Tenma, the Pegasus Saint and his beloved friend, Alone, who would eventually become his greatest enemy, Hades.  
  
The story takes place in the same time period as Saint Seiya Next Dimension.
description.pt-br:
Este mangá conta a história da Guerra Santa anterior, que aconteceu no século XVIII, 250 anos antes da série original, no universo de Saint Seiya. A história é centrada na relação entre Tenma, o Cavaleiro de Pégaso e seu amado amigo, Alone, que eventualmente se tornaria seu maior inimigo, Hades. 

A história acontece no mesmo período de tempo de Saint Seiya Next Dimension.

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン　THE ANIMATION　碧き航路にバカンスを

altTitles.en: Azur Lane The Animation: Vacation on the Blue Line

description.en: Spin-off of "Azur Lane The Animation" that's focused on Zuikaku and Eugen on a deserted island. There, they also encountered some KAN-SEN from the opposite factions, Azur Lane.
description.ja: とある海域で瑞鶴・オイゲン達は正体不明の猛烈な嵐に巻き込まれ、無人島へ漂着。レッドアクシズは敵対するアズールレーンと邂逅するが、共に窮地を乗り越えるべく、一時的に手を組む事に。拠点は島内で発見した“廃校”！リーダーは重桜・瑞鶴と鉄血・オイゲン！

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en: An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!
description.ja: 普通の高校生・小滝夢路のクラスに転校してきたのは、身長が8メートルに巨大化した幼馴染・大峰ちえりだった！ちえりの学校生活のサポートをする「お手伝いさん」を任された夢路。身長差がある二人の日常はドキドキがいっぱいで!?　高低差もなんのその！
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: 霧尾ファンクラブ

description.en: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

altTitles.ja: ごくちゅう！

description.en: This is bad, this is bad! I got caught with some weed on me, and now I'm off to jail! Can I make some friends here in prison...?
description.ja: たいへんたいへ～ん！お野菜(●麻)の所持がバレて、ムショ暮らしになっちゃった！こんな状況(獄中生活)だけど、お友達できるカナ…？
description.vi: Sau khi bị cảnh sát bắt quả tang đang tàng trữ "Cỏ" trái phép, Haruno Urara đã bị tuyên án 1 năm tù và giờ đây cô sẽ phải chuyển tới buồng giam mới. Liệu rằng cô ấy sẽ có thể kết bạn được với những người bạn tù mới của mình?

altTitles.ja: #そのギャップにょゎぃ 特集

description.en:
"If I knew about this gap of yours, I'd fall in love!"

The side your partner only shows you is irresistible! There's plenty of addictive gap moe in these stories! A collection of one shots featuring "gap boys."

Cover Illustration: Machi Suehiro

List of stories:
1. The Chief Iwatsuji Only I Know / **Ore dake Shitteru Iwatsuji Kachou** (俺だけ知ってる岩辻課長) by ***Utsumi Long***

2. Cute Liar / **Kawaii Usotsuki** (かわいいうそつき) by ***Suehiro Machi***

3. **NON STOP Zaizen-kun** (NON STOP財前くん) by ***Kusege***

4. The Right Way to Shorten Our Distance / **Tadashii Kyori no Chizume Kata** (正しい距離の縮め方) by ***JANMN***

5. Akaoni-kun's Rice Ball / **Akaoni-kun no Onigiri** (赤鬼くんのおにぎり) by ***Hakata***

6. It's Your Fault for Being So Suggestive / **Omowaseburi na Kimi ga Warui** (思わせぶりな君がわるい) by ***Tamaki Tsumugu***

7. About a Guy Called "Matsubara" / **"Matsubara" to Iu Otoko** (「松原」という男) by ***Hashioka Ritsuki***

8. Tell Me About Your Fingers / **Yubisaki de Oshiete** (指先でおしえて) by ***Yamamoto Mato***

10. Do You Understand What You're Doing, Senpai? / **Senpai, Wakatte Yatten no?** (先輩、わかってやってんの？) by ***Rakuta Shouko***
description.ja:
＼君のそんなギャップ知ったら好きになっちゃうだろ！／

🌟pixivコミックだけでお届けするショート特集🌟
完全新作読み切り集「ギャップ男子」が大集合！

相手にしか見せないその姿がたまらない、
やみつきになるギャップが盛りだくさん！
複数の作家陣が「ギャップ男子」をテーマに執筆！

title.en: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.ja: オタク君の性癖を一生歪めていく異種族娘たち

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.en: Interspecies Girls Who Will Twist Otaku-kun's Fetishes for the Rest of His Life

altTitles.ru: Девушки иных рас, пожизненно искажающие сексуальные предпочтения Отаку-куна

description.en:
The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races!

Can you keep your reason?
description.ja: 主人公のオタク君を特殊性癖に目覚めさせてしまう、異種族娘たちとのハプニング交流の数々！君は理性を保つことができるか!?

title.en: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.

altTitles.ja: 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Sūfungo no Mirai ga Wakaru Yō ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro ha Wakaranai.

altTitles.en: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman’s Heart.

altTitles.id: Sekarang saya dapat melihat masa depan dalam beberapa menit, tetapi saya tidak dapat memahami hati seorang wanita.

description.id: Arase Itou bisa melihat beberapa menit ke depan. Namun, masa depan yang ia lihat selalu berhubungan dengan masalah. Arase yang baik hati berusaha menghindari masa depan yang tidak menyenangkan ini, namun pada akhirnya masalah tersebut tetap membuatnya membantu berbagai gadis dengan masalah mereka. Tanpa ia sadari, para gadis mulai menyukainya. Arase tidak menyadari bahwa, diam-diam, para gadis bersaing untuk memperebutkannya.

altTitles.ja: ようこそ、305号室へ

description.en: Junghyun Kim, who had a normal upbringing, and his roommate Homo Kim.This is the sensitive, embarrassing story of these two who are different in every way.

title.en: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.ja: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.en: The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World
A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.id: Idol Gak Guna dan Penggemar Satu-satunya di Dunia

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

altTitles.es-la: Humillando al jade y escogiendo a la perla

description.en:
When Ding Hanbai, the young master of the centuries-old jade-carving shop, first laid eyes on his timid shidi Ji Zhenzhu, he bullied him relentlessly, not expecting that Jiangnan could produce someone who would break down his defenses and melt his heart this way.   
They go from being unable to stand each other to admiring one another, but as the days pass, even this admiration begins to evolve…   
A step from brotherhood, a step to special affection, and one more step into a lifetime together.
description.es-la:
Cuando Ding Hanbai, el joven maestro de la tienda con cien años de antigüedad en la extracción de jade, puso sus ojos en su tímido shidi Ji Zhenzhu, él lo intimidó implacablemente, sin esperar que Jiangnan pudiera producir a alguien que derribara sus defensas y derritiera su corazón de esa manera.
Ellos pasaron, de no poder soportarse el uno al otro, a admirarse mutuamente, pero conforme los días iban pasando, incluso esa admiración fue evolucionando…
A un paso de la amistad, a un paso de un sentimiento especial, y un paso más hacia una vida juntos.
Nota: El título que escogimos para el manhua, se basó en uno de los varios significados de la palabra Crushing, y que se enfoca en la historia haciendo analogía en como "Ding que era un experto de tesoros, dejó de lado su pasión por estos y eligió su amor por Ji, su perla".

altTitles.ja: ステラ・ステップ

description.en: In a desolate dystopia, Idols weave a story of love and bonding. In a world devastated by the sudden arrival of a meteorite, countries use Idols as a means of war, plundering resources and territories based on the quality of their performances. In this context, in one of the nations, the "Land of Sand", Idol "Rain" reigns supreme, being feared by other Idols as a "Disaster". Although she is the strongest, she lacks emotions, until she meets "Hana", a girl who longs to be the real "Idol" who used to bring smiles to people. Together, they embark on a new destiny.
description.es-la: En una distopía desolada, las armas (Idols) tejen una historia de amor y vínculo. En un mundo devastado por la repentina llegada de un meteorito, los países utilizan a las Idols como medio de guerra, saqueando recursos y territorios basándose en la calidad de sus actuaciones. En este contexto, en una de las naciones, la "Tierra de la Arena", la Idol "Rain" reina en la cima, siendo temida por otras Idols como un "Desastre". Aunque es la más fuerte, carece de emociones, hasta que conoce a "Hana", una chica que anhela ser la verdadera "Idol" que solía traer sonrisas a la gente. Juntas, se embarcan en un nuevo destino.

title.en: Tensei Shitekara 40-nen. Sorosoro, Ojisan mo Koi ga Shitai. Nidome no Jinsei wa Harem Route?!

altTitles.ja: 転生してから４０年。そろそろ、おじさんも恋がしたい。　二度目の人生はハーレムルート!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shite Kara 40-nen. Sorosoro, Ojisan mo Koi ga Shitai. Nidome no Jinsei wa Harem Route?!

altTitles.en: It's Been 40 Years Since I Was Reincarnated. It's Time for an Older Man Like Me to Fall In Love. My Second Life Is a Harem Route?!
It's been 40 years since I was reincarnated. It's time for this uncle to fall in love.

altTitles.ru: Прошло 40 лет с тех пор, как я перевоплотился. Пришло время этому дяде влюбиться.

description.en: Forty years have passed since his reincarnation, and the guild leader, Girold, has been working diligently. Looking back on his life, he realizes that he hasn't been able to get married, so he tries his best to get a girlfriend, but there is no luck. He thinks he's not popular, but the girls around him are trying to approach him… The harem love comedy from "Shosetsuka ni Narou" begins! (DeepL)

title.en: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru, Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~

altTitles.ja: ティアムーン帝国物語～断頭台から始まる、姫の転生逆転ストーリー～@COMIC

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: The Reincarnation Reversal Story of the Princess, Starting from the Guillotine

altTitles.th: บันทึกเรื่องราวจักรวรรดิเทียร์มูน จุดพลิกผันชะตากรรมของเจ้าหญิงเริ่มจากบนกิโยติน

altTitles.zh: 迪阿姆帝国物语 ～从断头台开始的、公主的转生逆转传

altTitles.zh-hk: 堤亞穆帝國物語～從斷頭台開始，公主重生後的逆轉人生～

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: Beginning from the Guillotine, a Story of a Reincarnated Princess Making a Turn Around

altTitles.vi: Biên niên sử về đế chế Tearmoon

description.en:
In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self??

To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures… "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" 

Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!
description.ja: 崩壊したティアムーン帝国で、わがまま姫と蔑まれた皇女ミーアは処刑された――はずが、目覚めた彼女は12歳の少女に逆戻り？？ 第二の人生でギロチンを回避するため、帝政の建て直しを決意する。手始めに忠義に厚い下っ端メイドと、左遷されかけた優秀な文官を味方につけ、失敗した過去をやり直す日々が始まった。けれど、ミーアの本音は「我が身の安全第一」。仇敵を遠ざけ、人脈作りに励むうちに、なぜか周囲の忖度で次々と奇跡が実現！やがて、身勝手なはずの行動は大陸全土の未来を大きく変えていくのだった……。保身上等！自己中最強！小心者の元(？)ポンコツ姫が前世の記憶を使って運命に抗う、一世一代の歴史改変ファンタジー！
description.es-la: En el Imperio Tearmoon, la despreciada princesa egoísta Mia fue sentenciada a muerte, ¡O al menos se suponía que debía serlo! ¿En cambio, ella se despertó como su yo de doce años? Para evitar la guillotina en su segunda vida, no repetirá sus fracasos pasados​​... "¡P-para mí, algo de este nivel es una tarea fácil!" ¡Última defensa personal! ¡Autoconciencia más fuerte! Usando su imagen de princesa tímida y previamente torpe, irá en contra del destino, ¡Una fantasía única en la vida de arreglar la historia!

title.en: Moto Kizoku Reijou de Mikon no Haha Desuga, Musumetachi ga Kawaii Sugite Boukenshagyo mo Ku ni Narimasen

altTitles.ja: 元貴族令嬢で未婚の母ですが、娘たちが可愛すぎて冒険者業も苦になりません
元貴族令嬢で未婚の母ですが、娘たちが可愛すぎて冒険者業も苦になりません＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kizoku Reijou de Mikon no Haha Desuga, Musumetachi ga Kawaii Sugite Boukenshagyo mo Ku ni Narimasen＠COMIC

altTitles.en: Even Though I'm a Former Noble and a Single Mother, My Daughters Are Too Cute and Working as an Adventurer Isn't Too Much of a Hassle

altTitles.th: อดีตขุนนางสาวโสดกับชีวิตโลดโผนผจญภัยเพื่อลูกสาวสุดน่ารัก

altTitles.zh: 虽然是原贵族大小姐单身妈妈，但女儿太可爱了当冒险者也不会辛苦

description.en:
A world where monsters run rampant.

A noblewoman falls from grace and loses everything after being falsely accused.

But, she started a fresh life as an 'Immortal.' She became an adventurer capable of defeating disaster-rank monsters and taking the heads off ancient dragons with a single swing of her blade. However, behind that cool exterior… beats the heart of a ridiculously over-indulgent mother?!

"What should I do, my daughters are just too cute?!"

She wields her deadly sword for the sake of motherly love! Ogres flee and dragons tremble at the sight of this overpowered adventurer!

The fantasy adventure of the Doting Mother Sword Demon begins now!

Mitsuhiko Amano is full of regrets. A 46 year old salaryman who had just been laid off, he was told that his wife wanted a divorce, something that he might have been wanting for years. So he visits a soapland, a place he hasn't been since he started dating his wife 22 years ago. While there, a fire suddenly erupts, trapping Amano and a soapland girl in the bath. In a rare moment of bravery and decisiveness, Amano attempts to lead the girl to safety, only to slip and hit his head. As his consciousness fades, he sees the back of the soapland girl making her escape… A fresh set of regret blankets him as he passes out, that his wife Sachiko and daughter Miyu will be objects of ridicule that he died in such a place…  
  
Then he awakens. In front of him is Ozawa Satsuki, a girl he hardly knew but secretly liked in high school. And Takahashi, Nakao-san, and Iijima-kun too. All his high school friends in their high school uniform, in their, and his, old high school… He has slipped 30 years into his past.  
  
Has he been given a second chance? To change his life so that the regrets that weighed him down never happen this time around?

title.en: Jaa Kimi No Kawari Ni Korosou Ka ~ Prequel

altTitles.vi: Vậy, để tớ giết chúng thay cậu nhé? ~ Tiền truyện

altTitles.en: Well, Shall I Murder Instead of You? ~ Prequel

altTitles.ja: じゃあ、君の代わりに殺そうか？ ～プリクエル

description.en: The prequel to the series [Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?].  The main character this time is Kumaoka Aizen (Ameli's younger half-brother who appears in chapter 22 of the main story), the son of a yakuza boss.  The story takes place during Aizen's middle school years and this section focuses on describing the personality changes of Aizen and the other half-siblings that Aizen has met.
description.vi: Phần tiền truyện của bộ Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka? . Nhân vật chính lần này là Kumaoka Aizen (em trai cùng cha khác mẹ của Ameri xuất hiện ở chap 22 trong chính truyện), con trai của lão đại yakuza. Câu chuyện diễn ra vào hồi cấp 2 của Aizen và phần này tập trung miêu tả quá trình thay đổi nhân cách của Aizen và những anh em cùng cha khác mẹ khác mà Aizen đã gặp.

altTitles.en: Yuri Yuri dj - Yuri Yuri After

description.en:
A series of original doujinshi that Namori published under her circle ELEGY SYNDROME, each volumes contain several extra stories by various guest artists.  
  
Volumes 1-3 & 5, were done by Namori herself. The rest of these volumes are extra stories from other artists.

title.en: Class ga Isekai Shoukan sareta Naka Ore dake Nokotta n desu ga

altTitles.en: My Entire Class Was Summoned To Another World Except For Me

altTitles.id: Semua Orang Di Kelasku Di Panggil Ke Dunia Lain Selain Aku

altTitles.ru: Весь мой класс, кроме меня, призвали в иной мир

altTitles.ja: クラスが異世界召喚されたなか俺だけ残ったんですが

altTitles.zh-hk: 班級同學都被召喚到異世界，只有我幸存下來

altTitles.zh: 班级同学都被召唤到异世界，只有我幸存下来

description.en:
A god of a different world had abruptly appeared in Kamiya Yato's classroom and forcibly summoned the entire class to his world… except for him, because he was sleeping in a seat in the corner of the class, the round summoning magic circle didn't reach him, and he ended up staying here on Earth, but with brand-new skills.  
  
After he made it through a whole year full of police interviews and journalism reports, he finally became a high school student, but the quiet days he had hoped for were far from over; be it terrorists who decide to occupy his school or even monsters from different world, one by one new incidents take place in the town he lives in…  
  
Will a boy without any motivation be able to save the world?

Note: No raw updates since October 2021; assume hiatus by author. Comic Boost still lists the series as an "irregular serialization" rather than axed, so there remains a slim possibility for future updates.  
  


---
description.ru:
Бог иного мира внезапно появился в классе Камии Ято и принудительно призвал весь класс в свой мир… Кроме него… Потому что он спал в углу класса и магический круг призыва не коснулся его. И он остался на Земле, но обрел новые навыки.  
  
После целого года допросов полицейскими и интервью с журналистами, он наконец поступил в старшую школу, но спокойные дни, которых он так желал, уже давно кончились. Будь то террористы, решившие захватить школу, или монстры из иного мира, в городе, где он живет, происходят одно событие за другим…  
Сможет ли парень безо всякой мотивации спасти мир?
description.pt-br: Um dia, um deus de outro mundo apareceu de repente na classe de Kamiya Yato e invocou pela força toda a sua sala de aula... mas, exceto ele, porque ele estava dormindo em um assento no canto da sala, o círculo mágico não o alcançou e ele acabou ficando na Terra, mas com novas habilidades.Depois de passar um ano cheio de entrevistas policiais e relatórios de jornais, ele acabou se tornando um estudante do ensino médio, mas os dias tranquilos que ele esperava estavam longe de terem terminado, sejam eles terroristas que decidiram ocupar sua escola ou mesmo monstros do outro mundo e novos incidentes ocorrem na cidade onde ele mora...Um garoto sem motivação pode salvar esse mundo?!

altTitles.ja: AREA D 異能領域

description.en: The "prison survival action" story is set after the sudden emergence of special powers in certain pockets of humanity. To deal with these so-called "Altered," a mysterious remote island prison named "Area D" was built.
description.ru: 12 жилийн өмнөх гамшиг хүн төрөлхтнийг өөрчилсөн. Одоо тэднийг "Онцгой чадвартанууд" гэдэг. Тэднийг удирдахын тулд бүхэл бүтэн арлын эзэлсэн "Д Хэсэг" гэгдэх шорон байгуулагдсан. Уг шоронг хэн удирддаг нь тодорхойгүй. Магадгүй шорон өөрөө илүү аюул авчирах байх.

title.en: Sore wa Rei no Shiwaza desu

altTitles.en: It's the work of the Ghost

altTitles.ja: それは霊のしわざです

altTitles.th: รักนี้ผีจัดให้

description.en: My name is Torii Nozomu, a plain introvert. Suddenly a new transfer student, Kirishima Kyoko, sits next to me. She's cute, kind, and for some reason she proactively talks to me, even though I'm a nerd! A true saint. Yet I want to get involved with her as little as possible because she's haunted by a "ghost" that only I can see! She's a little naughty, extremely pure and, in some cases, horrifying! Will I ever find a way to handle her?
description.fr: Je m'appelle Torii Nozomi. Un jour, une nouvelle fille est arrivée dans ma classe. Elle est très jolie, mais le problème c'est qu'elle est suivie par un fantôme (très taquin) que je suis le seul à voir !
description.ja: 地味で目立たない陰キャな僕、鳥居望(とりいのぞむ)。そんな僕の隣に席に転校生の霧島京子(きりしまきょうこ）ちゃんがやってきた。可愛くて優しくて、なぜか陰キャな僕にも積極的に話しかけてくれる「ぐう聖」な京子ちゃん！…だけど僕はなるべく彼女にかかわりたくない。だって、彼女には僕にだけ見える“霊”が憑いてるんだ！！！！――ちょっとエッチで、とびきりピュアで、ところによりホラー！？

altTitles.ja: 娘の寝室

altTitles.vi: Phòng ngủ của con gái tôi

description.en: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!? A family suspense of immorality!
description.vi: Goto, một giảng viên đại học đang tận hưởng cuộc sống gia đình đầm ấm bên vợ mình là một nữ họa sĩ ăn khách xinh đẹp cùng hai người con. Nhưng rồi khi bắt đầu nảy sinh mối hiềm nghi vợ mình ngoại tình, cộng thêm bản thân đang bị một cơn ác mộng giày vò đã khiến tâm trí anh trở nên ngày càng suy sụp thấy rõ. Bỗng một ngày nọ khi vừa đi làm về, Goto phát hiện phòng ngủ của con gái mình bị ai đó phá tan hoang, và con gái anh đang ngồi khóc trên sàn. Tin rằng những hành động điên rồ này là chỉ có thể là do vợ làm ra, Goto liền quyết định sẽ đứng lên bảo vệ gia đình nhỏ của mình.

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true…

altTitles.ja: 勇者が帰ってきた

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

被黑化勇士们毁灭的世界，
绝望之中最后的勇士归来！
经历千辛万苦最终回到地球的勇士金闵洙，可等他的却是人们冰冷的眼光和父母双亡的事实，绝望的他决定毁灭整个世界。男主朴正秀的家人也被陷入到了这场灾难之中…就在这时，朴正秀也被传送到了异世！勇士朴正秀能否拯救这个世界呢？

altTitles.ja: 邪神監禁ハーレムで異世界征服！

altTitles.zh: 监禁邪神用后宫征服异世界

description.en: A chaotic, different world ruled by evil gods. The main character, Yuya, wakes up to the sound of a girl's voice calling his name. It is a temple of desire ruled by the evil god Liv where numerous people were immersed in pleasure like crazy. Even in the midst of all this, Yuya still maintains his rationality. Liv shows her interest and ties him up with special chains. However, the chain was originally a weapon that deprived evil of their powers by imprisoning and subjugating them. Due to the revelation of the old god Agnes, who resides in the chains, Yuya uses his power to imprison dangerous evil gods one after another.
description.ja:
邪神たちに支配された混沌の異世界――。
主人公・ユウヤは、自分の名前を呼ぶ少女の声とともに目覚める。
そこは邪神リヴが支配する欲望の神殿で、
大勢の人々が狂ったように快楽を貪っていた。

そんな中でも理性を保ったままのユウヤに、
リヴは興味を示し、特別な鎖で縛りあげる。
しかしその鎖こそは、本来邪神を戒めるための道具であり、
監禁・屈服させることで邪神のスキルを奪う武器だったのだ。

鎖に宿る旧神アグネスの「王座におつきなさい」との啓示により、
ユウヤはその力を使い、危険な邪神たちを次々と監禁していく…。

冴えない男の異世界監禁×逆襲エロファンタジー、開幕！

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.
